price: ߊ߲ ߘߏ߲߬ ߣߊ߬ ߖߟߐ߬ߞߐ ߟߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߏߟߏ߲ߜߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߖߌ߯ߖߌ߮ ߟߋ߬ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ ߠߊ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
